title: Chocolate chip and marshmallow blondies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '220g soft brown sugar', '200g smooth peanut butter', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '325g chocolate chips', '75g miniature marshmallows']
